name: film-gallery-desktop
description: Film Gallery â€” Electron desktop wrapper for the Film Manager app
author: Your Name

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev:client: cd client && cross-env PORT=3000 REACT_APP_API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:3000 npm start
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -k -n SERVER,CLIENT,ELECTRON "npm:dev:server" "npm:dev:client" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n CLIENT,ELECTRON "npm:dev:client" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run dev:electron"
scripts.rebuild:electron: cd server && npm run rebuild:electron && cd ../packages/@filmgallery/libraw-native && npx @electron/rebuild -v 26.6.10
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run rebuild:electron && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run rebuild:electron && electron-builder
